mapper.select: select * from team_board order by team_board_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into team_board ( member_id, team_board_category, team_board_title, team_board_content, team_board_start_datetime, team_board_end_datetime, team_board_total_count, team_board_front_remain_count, team_board_back_remain_count ) values ( #{memberId}, #{teamBoardCategory}, #{teamBoardTitle}, #{teamBoardContent}, #{teamBoardStartDatetime}, #{teamBoardEndDatetime}, #{teamBoardTotalCount}, #{teamBoardFrontRemainCount}, #{teamBoardBackRemainCount} )
mapper.update: update team_board set team_board_title = #{boardTitle}, team_board_content = #{boardContent}, team_board_category = #{boardCategory}, team_board_start_datetime = #{boardStartDatetime}, team_board_end_datetime = #{boardEndDatetime}, team_board_total_count = #{boardTotalCount}, team_board_front_remain_count = #{boardFrontRemainCount}, team_board_back_remain_count = #{boardBackRemainCount} where team_board_no = #{boardNo}
